prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green and yellow colors and unique web-like patterns.
Imagine a small insect Pokemon that can camouflage in grassy environments, using its colors to blend in.
Show me a Pokemon that has a shiny green body with a tiny blue dot on its head, resembling a spider.
Design a Pokemon that can spin webs and is often found in forested areas, showcasing its insectoid features.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body and long legs, featuring yellow accents and big expressive eyes.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban habitats, using its colors to create visually appealing webs.
Give me a Pokemon with a distinct bug-like appearance, known for its agility and clever tactics in battle.

distinctive_features: Tiny blue dot on its head
